node.title: Suicide, forced puberty and underage marriage on the rise as young girls 'bear the brunt' of Syria's war
node.alt: An Internally displaced girl from Deraa province carries a stuffed toy and holds the hand of a child
node.description: Ten years of conflict has taken a devastating toll on Syrian girls with child marriage, forced puberty, suicide and self harm on the rise, according to a new report.
node.content:
["Ten years of conflict has taken a devastating toll on Syrian girls with\u00a0child marriage, forced puberty, suicide and self harm\u00a0on the rise, according to a new report.", "The report, titled In Harm's Way, found the crisis has profoundly changed\u00a0the lives of women and girls in Syria, but adolescent girls in\u00a0particular have faced \"complex challenges\u00a0that have influenced their development and impacted the rest of their lives\".", "The research, which was released on Thursday, was conducted\u00a0by\u00a0Plan International in conjunction with\u00a0local aid group Women Now for Development and included\u00a0extensive interviews with girls, parents, social workers and health professionals.", "\"Adolescent girls are bearing the brunt of this crisis in a way that is really quite alarming,\" said Plan International Australia's\u00a0deputy CEO Hayley Cull.", "She said gender\u00a0inequality was becoming more entrenched, leading to increased violence against\u00a0women and an increase in suicide rates.", "In Syria's\u00a0north-west, suicides\u00a0this year jumped\u00a0by 86 per cent compared to\u00a0the first three months of 2020, the report said, and almost one in five of all recorded suicide attempts and deaths\u00a0were\u00a0children.", "Despite the increasing hardships they face, Ms Cull said Syrian girls were\u00a0holding fast\u00a0to a believe\u00a0in \"their ability to have a bright future\".", "
Underage marriage driven by poverty
", "", "
Repeated displacement has left children even more vunerable.(ABC News: Tracey Shelton)
", "Researchers found that widespread poverty was pushing families into arranging marriages for their daughters at\u00a0increasingly younger ages.", "Under Syrian law, the minimum legal age of marriage is 17 for girls, but religious judges can authorise marriage much\u00a0younger, as long as the girl has reached puberty.", "Such cases were not as\u00a0common before the conflict began.", "In 2006, the UN estimated around 13 per cent of Syrian girls were married before their 18th birthday, but a more recent survey suggested\u00a0that number is now around 41 per cent.", "Many of the girls, parents and social workers interviewed felt that\u00a0marriage could\u00a0serve as a protection\u00a0from harassment and violence during the conflict.", "Ms Cull said child marriages\u00a0can sometimes inadvertently \"be painted as parents doing the wrong thing by their children\".", "\u00a0\"A\u00a0way of trying\u00a0to support their children and their daughters in the most challenging of circumstances.\"", "", "
Desperate families often seek early marriage as a protection for their daughters.(ABC News: Tracey Shelton)
", "Syrian psychiatrist Mohammad Abo-Hilal said early marriage can be detrimental if the girl\u00a0is not mature physically or psychologically. But in some circumstances it can be the best solution for vulnerable girls.", "He said some well intentioned efforts by foreign aid groups to condemn the practice were \"reckless\" and gave no consideration to local beliefs and customs.", "\"Donors and NGOs, by their money, are ending up\u00a0imposing their opinions,\" he told the ABC, adding that such condemnation can reflect badly on the young brides themselves.", "He stressed the need for a culturally adapted approach.", "\"I am just sad about wasting money on wrong and sometimes harmful approaches while we could have used them in real improvement of women and girls lives,\" said Dr Abo-Hilal.", "A Syrian Protection Coordinator for Women Now for Development, who did not wish to be named, said women in Syria do not have the chance to chase their dreams.", "\"Some girls haven't reached 25 [years of age yet] and they may have been married two or three times and it's very disturbing to hear that some girls are 25 and have maybe five children,\" she said.", "Instead, life is about survival.", "\"I see the gaps between me as a Syrian\u00a0woman ... who had acquired a good position in my work, in my career, and have a good quality of education while others are trying to survive.\"", "
Forcing\u00a0puberty with hormone drugs
", "", "
Using drugs to bring on puberty in girls is \"very harmful\" and will lead to many complications, according\u00a0to a\u00a0gynaecologist\u00a0in north-west Syria.(Retuers: Rodi Said)
", "One alarming trend connected to underage marriage \u2014\u00a0forced puberty \u2014 was also recorded\u00a0in a report this year by the United Nations Population Fund.", "Forced puberty involves injecting or giving pills to young girls with hormones to induce early puberty.", "One gynaecologist\u00a0in north-west Syria told\u00a0Women Now for Development that many parents had requested hormone pills, but that she had refused to provide these.", "\"This is a very harmful act against the girls; it affects their reproductive and mental health,\" she said.", "\"In addition, they will face many complications in the sexual relations with their partners, pregnancy, delivering the baby and breastfeeding since they are not ready mentally and physically to be in such situations.\"", "However, the parents interviewed by the organisation said they did not know of the practice and several Syrian health workers contacted by the ABC said they did not know of it either.", "Ms Cull said much more research was needed to understand the extent of forced puberty.", "
Drastic drop in education
", "", "
Most girls are not continuing education into their adolescence due to\u00a0security concerns, child marriage and\u00a0family obligations.(AP: Francisco Seco)
", "Before the conflict began in Syria, around 97 per cent of primary school-aged children\u00a0were attending class.", "Today\u00a0one-third of all school-aged children in Syria or 2.4 million are out of school and have been for an average of four years.", "For adolescent girls,\u00a0just 31 per cent are still receiving an education with some of the key reasons for dropping out being\u00a0security concerns, child marriage and\u00a0family obligations.", "", "
Most boys leave school to work and support family.(Reuters: Aboud Hamam)
", "For boys, the need to work and provide financially for families was a key reason for an even sharper decrease in education rates, with only 22 per cent of adolescent boys attending school.", "Syrian schools that are still operating face constant shelling, minimal resources, increasing numbers of displaced students and COVID-19-related restrictions.", "Teachers interviewed said they were working almost on a voluntary basis with a lack of basic infrastructure in schools and crowded classrooms with up to 50 students per class.", "
What needs to be done?
", "", "
Restoring the daily routines of children including education and play is crucial.(ABC News: Tracey Shelton)
", "Ms Cull said the\u00a0sharp drop in education levels was\u00a0closely connected to the rise in child marriage and increasing suicide rates.", "\"If we can find ways of getting girls or keeping them in school, that can be one of the best way of protecting against these sort of outcomes.\"", "Education not only serves as a protection but is\u00a0crucial\u00a0for rebuilding Syria when the conflict ends, according to Ms Cull.", "\"They have the ability to change the world. They have the ability to rebuild Syria, they are the future of the country.\""]
